overview: This is a story of Magno, played by Leo Martinez, who is from Batangas and has the ability to attract women like flies. Magno and his wife (Anjanette Abayari) want to have children but are unable to. For as long as Magno continues to fool around, they will never have any. He goes to Manila hoping to change.
tagline: Gusto kong bumaet pero di ko magawa
title: Batangueño, Kabitenyo
